author.name: Click here to visit HorizonsBot's GitHub

title: Supporting Imaginary Horizons
description: Thanks for being a part of the Imaginary Horizons Community. Here are a few ways to support us:

fields.name: Invite Friends
fields.value: Ask a moderator how to get an invite link for the server!

fields.name: Vote for us on top.gg
fields.value: top.gg is a Discord bot/server listing and distrabution service. Voting causes us to appear earlier in searches. [Vote here!](https://top.gg/servers/353575133157392385/vote)

fields.name: Check out the github
fields.value: Check out our [github](https://github.com/Imaginary-Horizons-Productions) and tackle some issues or sponsor a project!
